Module.Name: Absorption factors
Module.Description: Absorption factors are chemical- and route-specific values representing the fraction of external exposures passing the absorption barrier. They are used to derive internal systemic exposures from external exposures for some specified exposure route.
Module.ShortDescription: Absorption factors are used to derive internal systemic exposures from external exposures for some specified exposure route.
Module.DataDescription: Absorption factors are chemical- and route-specific values representing the fraction of external exposures passing the absorption barrier.
